name: Around the World for Lords Mobile
name_original: Around the World for Lords Mobile
description:
Around the World is a trivia game to test your knowledge about one popular title.

In the game there are two game ways, story mode and freeplay.

In story mode you have to collect enough points to unlock next level.

Freeplay mode offers you random questions, scoring is not so important!

There aren't just plain questions, you must be clever and answer the interactives aswell.

Answer questions, track down correct icon and don't miss a chance to click on mnsters!

Game progress is tracked, you can see how many times you had it correct and every answer is awarded by points and stars.
